name: Coremain
description:
Coremain is an independent provider of information technology and communications services with a high added value: more than 400 professionals committed to the quality policies for which we have permanently bet since the beginning of our activity in 1991.
Our experience in the development of successful projects, in these twenty years of existence, enables us to give an adequate response to those organizations that seek supplier of products and services.

locations.address: Parque Empresarial Costa Vella, C/ Amio, 128
